TopicTitle: Landing position on Mun is instable, twitching ap and pe while landed

Articles.Content:
I landed on distinctive impact crater on Mun. There was inaccurate surface grid and on screenshot you see that lander floated above surface (spoiler)

Spoiler


 But it also began to slide down an inclined surface apparently at a rate of 0.1 m/s. I think this made the game think that the machine was flying and it counted the orbit. That's why the nodes behaved like the one in the gif:

You see all signs that craft landed, I could do timewarp as stationary landed spacecraft, but there were still ap and pe
